name: LeBlanc
title: the Deceiver
lore: Mysterious even to other members of the Black Rose cabal, LeBlanc is but one of many names for a pale woman who has manipulated people and events since the earliest days of Noxus. Using her magic to mirror herself, the sorceress can appear to anyone, anywhere, and even be in many places at once. Always plotting just out of sight, LeBlanc's true motives are as inscrutable as her shifting identity.
blurb: Mysterious even to other members of the Black Rose cabal, LeBlanc is but one of many names for a pale woman who has manipulated people and events since the earliest days of Noxus. Using her magic to mirror herself, the sorceress can appear to anyone...
allytips: Distortion allows you to be aggressive with your other spells while being able to return to safety.
Using Distortion can help your positioning to land Ethereal Chains.
You can chain Sigil of Malice and Ethereal Chains to prevent characters with blink from escaping for up to 4 seconds.
enemytips: LeBlanc's ultimate can create fake LeBlancs during her spellcast or, rarely, at a distant position.
The fake LeBlanc created at a distance will always run at the nearest Champion, cast a harmless spell, then immediately disappear.
Attacking LeBlanc first avoids most of her tricks, especially if she's recently used her dash, Distortion.
Stunning or silencing LeBlanc will prevent her from activating the return part of Distortion.

riot_spell_q.name: Sigil of Malice
riot_spell_q.description: LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. Damaging the marked target with an ability detonates the sigil, dealing additional damage.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and marking the target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Damaging the marked target with an ability detonates the sigil, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

riot_spell_w.name: Distortion
riot_spell_w.description: LeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
LeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies near her destination.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location.

riot_spell_e.name: Ethereal Chains
riot_spell_e.description: LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc roots them and deals additional damage.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and granting True Sight of the target.

If the target remains shackled for {{ e3 }} seconds, LeBlanc roots them for {{ e4 }} seconds and deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

riot_spell_r.name: Mimic
riot_spell_r.description: LeBlanc casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
LeBlanc mimics her most recent spell, casting it again.

Mimicked Sigil of Malice and Ethereal Chains deal {{ rq1damage }} magic damage, plus {{ rq2damage }} magic damage from their mark and root, respectively.

Mimicked Distortion deals {{ rwdamage }} magic damage.

label: Mimicked Sigil of Malice / Ethereal Chains Damage
Mimicked Mark / Root Damage
Mimicked Distortion Damage
Mimic Cooldown

riot_spell_i.name: Mirror Image
riot_spell_i.description:
When LeBlanc drops below 40% health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.

Mirror Image has a 1 minute cooldown.

Mirror Image can be controlled by holding the Alt key and using the right mouse button.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Mirror Image
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: When LeBlanc damages an enemy with a spell, she marks the target for 4 seconds. After 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc's next spell shatters the Sigil to deal magic damage. Sigil of Malice cannot occur again on the same unit for 5 seconds.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} When '''LeBlanc''' reaches {{sti|health|{{as|below 40% '''maximum''' health}}}}, she creates a controllable [[decoy|clone]] of herself with the same items, statistics, {{as|health}} and {{as|mana}}, after which they both instantly become {{tip|invisibility|invisible}} for 1 second. The clone can basic attack but deals no damage, lasts for 8 seconds, and starts running 1900 units towards a random place in front of '''LeBlanc''' decided the moment it spawns.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: ''Mirror Image'' can only occur once every few seconds.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Sigil of Malice
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''LeBlanc''' projects an orb towards the target enemy, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and marking them for {{fd|3.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: The mark will be consumed once ''LeBlanc'' damages the marked target with an ability, dealing the same {{as|magic damage}} again.
wikia_skill_q1.notes: * ''Sigil of Malice'' and {{ai|Mimic Sigil of Malice|LeBlanc}} can detonate each other's marks.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Distortion
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: LeBlanc rapidly dashes to a target location, dealing magic damage to nearby units. In the following 4 seconds, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''LeBlanc''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location, {{as|damaging|magic damage}} all nearby enemies upon arrival and leaving a return pad at the cast location for 4 seconds. After {{tt|{{fd|0.2}}|Upon finishing the dash}} seconds she can recast {{ai|Distortion 2|LeBlanc|Distortion}} at no additional cost.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* ''LeBlanc'' will always travel to ''Distortion's'' return pad regardless of distance between the two.
* ''Distortion'' and {{ai|Mimic Distortion|LeBlanc}} have independent return pads and ''LeBlanc'' can travel to both while they are active.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Ethereal Chains
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: LeBlanc flings illusionary chains towards a target location. If it hits an enemy unit, it will deal initial magic damage and shackle them. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, the target takes additional magic damage and is unable to move.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''LeBlanc''' flings an illusory chain in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy it hits and tethering herself to them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: The target is {{tip|true sight|revealed}} while the tether is attached, and if it is not broken the target will be {{tip|root|rooted}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and dealt additional {{as|magic damage}}.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling2: {{st|Root Damage|{{ap|60 to 180}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|40+60 to 120+180}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* The tether can be removed with {{nie|Quicksilver}}.
* Both the initial and the delayed damage can detonate {{ai|Sigil of Malice|LeBlanc}}.
* ''Ethereal Chains'' and {{ais|Mimic Ethereal Chains|LeBlanc}} roots will occur concurrently.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Mimic
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''LeBlanc''' casts a mimicked version of her most recently used basic ability, applying the same effects and dealing modified {{as|magic damage}}.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: {{sbc|{{ai|Mimic Sigil of Malice|LeBlanc}}:}} Deals modified damage and double damage upon triggering the mark.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling2: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 210}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Mark Damage|{{ap|70*2 to 210*2}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|70*3 to 210*3}} {{as|(+ 120% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.description4: {{sbc|{{ai|Mimic Ethereal Chains|LeBlanc}}:}} Deals modified damage and double damage upon rooting.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling4: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 210}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Root Damage|{{ap|70*2 to 210*2}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|70*3 to 210*3}} {{as|(+ 120% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* ''Mimic'' will default to {{ai|Mimic Sigil of Malice|LeBlanc}} if ''LeBlanc'' ranks up ''Mimic'' without having used any abilities beforehand (even if she has not yet learned {{ai|Sigil of Malice|LeBlanc}}).
* {{ai|Sigil of Malice|LeBlanc}} and {{ai|Mimic Sigil of Malice|LeBlanc}} can detonate each other's marks.
* {{ai|Distortion|LeBlanc}} and {{ai|Mimic Distortion|LeBlanc}} have independent return pads and ''LeBlanc'' can travel to both while they are active.
* {{ai|Ethereal Chains|LeBlanc}} and {{ai|Mimic Ethereal Chains|LeBlanc}}' roots will occur concurrently.
* Both {{ai|Mimic Ethereal Chains|LeBlanc}} and {{ai|Mimic Sigil of Malice|LeBlanc}} will apply damage twice if the original ability's condition to do so is met.

wikia_champ.title: the Deceiver
wikia_champ.skill_r: Mimic;Mimic Sigil of Malice;Mimic Distortion;Mimic Ethereal Chains
